title: Optifine | 高清修复 官方reddit更新进度转载+翻译(1.15.2版本)
author: Wudji
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wudji 于 2020-11-13 21:12 编辑 
本篇翻译已过期!本篇翻译已过期!本篇翻译已过期!原贴地址：https://www.reddit.com/r/Optifine/comments/eb73s9/welcome_to_roptifine_please_read_before_posting/
OptiFine 1.15.2 is 99.6% done.
Optifine 1.15.2已完成99.6%(fixing bugs)修复bugThe UNSTABLE preview releases are here.
不稳定预览版本发布在这里←下载链接
(Click on "Preview versions")（点击“预览版本”）!!! THESE EARLY RELEASES ARE VERY UNSTABLE, AND NOT ALL FEATURES ARE WORKING YET. YOU WILL ENCOUNTER BUGS, AND POSSIBLY CRASHES !!!这些早期预览版本非常不稳定，不是所有的功能都能工作.你可能遭遇bug，甚至可能是崩溃！！！Features currently not yet working:不工作的功能Anti-aliasing 抗锯齿Anisotropic Filtering 各向异性过滤Render Regions 渲染区域*Possibly more 可能更多

Needs testing: 需要测试：Forge compatibility 对Forge的支持Shaders 光影CTM (Connected Textures) 无缝材质CIT (Custom Item Textures) 自定义物品纹理*CEM (Custom Entity Models, some models do not work yet) 自定义实体模型（一些模型可能不工作）Custom Colors 自定义颜色Other Resource Pack features 其他材质包功能

Please report all bugs to the issue tracker, and include as much information as possible.请把所有bug反馈给问题反馈处，介绍尽可能多的信息
Notes提示
There is no release date. There are no estimates or guesses. We have literally no idea when it will be done. Anything that says otherwise is pure speculation.没有确切的发布日期.没有预测。我们确实不知道它什么时候完成。除此之外其他的都是猜测（*）Official Mojang mappings are NOT being used for a very good reason.Official Mojang mappings不被使用的原因。(*)There is, and always has been only one developer: u/sp614x.有且自始至终只有一个开发者：u/sp614x.He has been doing this for over 8 years, so please consider donating! https://optifine.net/donate他已经做这个8年了，所以不要吝啬于捐献！https://optifine.net/donate
Progress Report History开发进度记录(May 2) 99.5% - Fixing Forge compatibility 修复对forge的支持(支持forge的版本发布)(Apr 6) 99.4% - Fixing Forge compatibility 修复对forge的支持(Apr 2) 99.3% - Bug found in progress calculation, release should be after April 1st 在进程中发现bug，应在4.1日后发布(Apr 1, AGAIN) 100% - Fixing the last minute bugfixes 修复“最后的bug修复”的bug修复-愚人节(Apr 1, AGAIN) 100% - Last minute bugfixes 最后的bug修复-愚人节(Apr 1, again) 100% - Building release version 编译正式发布版中-愚人节(Apr 1) 99.5% - Fixing Forge compatibility 正在添加对forge的支持(Mar 31) 99.2% - Fixing shader bugs 正在修复光影的漏洞(Mar 28) 99.1% - Fixing support for shaders 正在修复对光影的支持(Mar 26) 99% - Fixing support for shaders 正在修复对光影的支持(Mar 24) 98.1% - Fixing support for shaders 正在修复对光影的支持(Mar 22) 98% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Mar 21) 97.3% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Mar 20, again) 97.2% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Mar 20) 97.1% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Mar 11) 96.9% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Mar 1) 96.6% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Feb 27) 96% - Adding support for shaders 正在添加对光影的支持(Feb 21) 95% - Fixing bugs -> ???????? 修复bug，下同(Feb 19) 94% - Fixing bugs -> ????????(Feb 18) 93% - Fixing bugs(Feb 17) 92% - Fixing bugs(Feb 14) 91% - Fixing bugs(Feb 13, AGAIN) 90% - Fixing bugs(Feb 13, again) 89% - Fixing bugs (first unstable release 第一个不稳定预览版)(Feb 13) 89% - Fixing 12 compile errors 修复 个编写错误(Feb 12) 89% - Fixing 381 compile errors (Development switched to 1.15.2 转为开发1.15.2版本)(Feb 8) 88% - Fixing bugs(Feb 7) 87% - Fixing 44 compile errors 修复 个编写错误,下同(Feb 6) 86% - Fixing 48 compile errors(Feb 5) 85% - Fixing 48 compile errors(Feb 4) 83% - Fixing 48 compile errors(Feb 3) 82% - Fixing 52 compile errors(Jan 31) 78% - Fixing 187 compile errors(Jan 30) 76% - Fixing 219 compile errors(Jan 29) 74% - Fixing 272 compile errors(Jan 26) 72% - Fixing 306 compile errors(Jan 25, again) 71% - Fixing 363 compile errors(Jan 25) 70% - Fixing 387 compile errors(Jan 24, again) 68% - Fixing 530 compile errors(Jan 24) 67% - Fixing 575 compile errors(Jan 21) 65% - Fixing 633 compile errors(Jan 20) 63% - Fixing 1,287 compile errors(Jan 17) 60% - Fixing 1,480 compile errors(Jan 16) 56% - Merging OptiFine patches 合并OptiFine patches *，下同(Jan 8) 54% - Merging OptiFine patches(Jan 7, again) 46% - Merging OptiFine patches(Jan 7) 45% - Merging OptiFine patches(Jan 3) 40% - Merging OptiFine patches(Dec 31) 35% - Merging OptiFine patches(Dec 29) 30% - Merging OptiFine patches(Dec 21) 25% - Merging OptiFine patches(Dec 20) 21% - Updating MCP Mappings 更新MCP映射，下同*(Dec 19) 18% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 18) 15.7% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 17) 15% - Updating MCP Mappings (Development switched to 1.15.1 转为开发1.15.1版本) (Dec 16) 9.9% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 15) 9.2% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 13, again) 8.6% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 13) 8.3% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 12, AGAIN) 7.9% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 12, again) 7.2% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 12) 5% - Updating MCP Mappings(Dec 10) 0% - Updating MCP Mappings(Aug 22) 0% - Waiting for Minecraft 1.15 to be released 等待Minecraft1.15发布

渣渣翻译，见谅！* 不确定的翻译项
